bibl.title: Through the Narrow Gate of Heaven: Christian Fragments from the Bodleian Library
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Bodl. Ms.Gr.theol. g. 5 (P); P. Bodl. Ms.Gr.theol. f. 16 (P)
Konstantine Panegyres, Through the Narrow Gate of Heaven: Christian Fragments from the Bodleian Library.
1. Fragment on the Gates of Heaven (Bodl. MS. Gr. th. g. 5 [P]). Fourth or fifth century. - 2. Fragment on Death (Bodl. MS. Gr. th. f. 16 [P]). Fourth or fifth century.
bibl.note: 1. Fragment on the Gates of Heaven (Bodl. MS. Gr. th. g. 5 [P]). Fourth or fifth century. - 2. Fragment on Death (Bodl. MS. Gr. th. f. 16 [P]). Fourth or fifth century.
